name: Margyricarpus lanatus
distribution: Santa Catarina (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America)
locality: Lages, BR-116, ca. 15 km em direção a Vacaria
remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.496.3.7 The specific epithet makes reference to the woolly aspect of this species.

name: Margyricarpus microcarpus
distribution: Santa Catarina (Brazil South, Brazil, Southern America)
locality: Bom Jardim da Serra, Parque Nacional de São Joaquim, Campos de Santa Bárbara,
remarks: doi:10.11646/phytotaxa.496.3.7 The specific epithet makes reference to the small size of the fruits of this species.
